ai-anya-e0702n1:92_2: the most consequence of the elders in the most excellent Cotaliya country, Āḷavī, which is carried on as long as the most surrounded by the great earth, and so on. It has been stated in the Paṭisambhidā.
ai-anya-e0702n1:93_0: Thus the ninefold section of the Dispensation,
